name: Deja Vu (tbrooks3)
description: This is a simple game made for my BSU Game Development class. I used Blender to create the character model and animations and Unreal Engine for everything else. I used Unreal Marketplace assets to build the map with all of the other models as well. The game is based on a randomly generated them of Deja Vu. This is captured in that you are trapped in a map with 4 seemingly identical rooms. The goal is to find out how to escape. Here is a developer video to show that I meet all of the assignment requirements.
